title: Mwaghavul (1920) Genesis Portion (Sura)
description: Mwaghavul (also known as Mupun and Sura) is an Afro-Asiatic language spoken in Plateau State, dominantly in Mangu L.G.A., Middle Belt Region of Nigeria.
provider: The British and Foreign Bible Society

language.name: Mwaghavul
language.area: Plateau state, Barakin-Ladi and Mangu LGAs.
